entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: SSE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
